name: FORCE
description: This can be used to tell the program to ignore any active windows when doing output to the screen.

parameters.name: ON/OFF
parameters.description: ON/OFF - Required - If this option is ON the program will ignore any windows when displaying information to the screen. To return to normal mode the option would be OFF.

comments: You can also use the abs option in PMSG (Print Message), CLRLNE (Clear Line), etc. Don’t forget to turn this off (FORCE OFF) when you’re done.
